description:
3d bikes city racing 2017 is a furious 3d motorcycle race and hot city racing game with great dynamics.

How to play the game?

It is a simple racing game but it is involved with so many twists and tweaks that you as a player will get no option left but to enjoy the game at its fullest extent. Have you ever driven a Harley Davidson racing bike? You will get to select one your dream bike out of six racing motorbikes options! There are funny stunts and speed frenzy unlimited integrated in the game play. You have to select one bike and start your bike race at your fingertips, and your exciting journey to motorbike race will get start from the next moment!

You can get the access of surprise box and you can enjoy more power to your racing frenzy!
• Now you can play the racing game by tilting the mobile from move it left to right,
• The hidden analog button on the screen will support you the players to use the necessary products.

App’s Features:
Before you start playing this furious racing bike game, check all app integrated features. Prior knowledge of these features will help you to enjoy the racing game at its best:
• Stunning and smart user interface that makes the game easy-to-navigate,
• You can off/on sound and background music
• The app offers unique in app purchase, you can make your purchase at garage and shop to upgrade your racing bike
• Smart graphics and clean gameplay are the two main attractions of the game,
• You will get to participate in various tasks and achievements.
• Check and participate tasks and day wise racing plans to stay always right on track.

Download the app 3d bikes city racing 2016 on your iOS device. The racing game is optimized for ipad too. Star playing the racing game and enjoy the speed of ultra-fast racing bike at your fingertips.
